name: Respect The Lawn
description:
The Lawn is under attack, we need your help!

Respect the lawn is a fast paced 3rd person action shooter that requires you to be quick on your feet and think strategically. 

In this game you will face a lawnmower that is determined to remove all mushrooms from its garden.
As a mushroom yourself, this is of course, unacceptable.

Stop the lawnmower from destroying the garden and protect your friends. 

Gather materials and craft a variety of traps that will help you in your fight. Target it's weak spots and hit it where it hurts most.

But don't get too comfortable once you have it destroyed, this lawnmower will come back stronger than before and with a few new tricks.

Are you able to survive long enough to defeat this mighy foe?
